scripts.install-all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -c "blue,green" -n backend,frontend "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -c "blue,green" -n backend,frontend "npm --prefix backend start" "npm --prefix frontend run preview -- --port 5173 --strictPort"
